alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:43PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Humboldt and northern Lander Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 343 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Battle Mountain, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Battle Mountain and Phoenix Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
